name: demo-flow
title: Demo Flow
description: Demo Flow is a Raycast extension that lets you organize demo snippets and quickly paste the next/previous snippet during a walkthrough.
author: 1weiho

commands.name: manage-demo-snippets
commands.title: Manage Demo Snippets
commands.description: Create and manage demos and snippets

commands.name: menu-bar
commands.title: Menu Bar Demo Snippet
commands.description: Menu bar preview of upcoming snippets

commands.name: import-demo-snippet
commands.title: Import Demo Snippet
commands.description: Import JSON file or paste JSON

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
